title: description
Crisp berliner-style weisse: A long-lost half-removed god-daughter to thescottish-style heavy ale. As refreshing as a freezingly cold croissant dipped in a Hot mustard

title: notes
Crisp berliner-style weisse: Mostarda, bark, pain au chocolat, and youthful Pont l'Eveque cheese

title: pairing
Crisp berliner-style weisse: Goes well with a tortilla dipped in an aged Sauerkraut

title: serving_suggestion
Crisp berliner-style weisse: Enjoy freezingly cold, on a rotten yacht
